Text: A personal invitation Cc Jeff Enron is one of our most valued customers and a leading innovator in the use of the Internet to enable new business opportunities in your industry I believe that executives of other major companies would be very interested in learning about the ways that you have shaped your business and leveraged networking technology to create EnronOnline and Enron Communications With this in mind I would like to personally invite you to speak to a highly select group of CEOs and CIOs from Global corporations at our CEO Summit being held on April at the Ritz Carlton Half Moon Bay California The focus of the conference will be on using Internet business solutions to maximize global competitiveness I would also like to spend some time with you more in a one on one setting to discuss the industry and the markets in general but candidly to get to know you better and build on our relationship Jeff I would be honored if you would accept this invitation I will followup with you shortly to answer any questions you may have and to see about your availability Sincerely John Chambers President and CEO
